author: jpieper
msg: Update FSFS to use the latest delta combiner function signature.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(get_combined_window): Ditch the context variable and argument.

author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, fill in the easy parts of the FS API
implementation (the ones which are just vtable calls or trivial field
manipulations).
* libsvn_fs/fs_loader.c: Fill in easy function implementations.
* libsvn_fs/fs.h:
(fs_vtable_t): svn_fs_open_txn does not take a cfg parameter.
Need a purge_txn vtable call.
(txn_vtable_t): commit and abort vtable calls need pools.
svn_fs_txn_base_revision does not need a vtable call; it's easily
implemented in the abstract.  svn_fs_txn_root does not take a cfg
parameter.
(root_vtable_t): Recomment a bit.  Fix typos in check_path and
node_created_rev.  Add node_created_path call.  Remove delete_tree
call, and move delete_node out of the directory section.
(svn_fs_root_t): Change root_kind_t field to a boolean for
simplicity.

author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, add a straw-man skeleton of the loader.
* libsvn_fs: New directory.
* libsvn_fs/fs_loader.c: Add empty implementations of each of the
functions in the svn_fs API.
* libsvn_fs/fs.h: Based on gat's document, define the vtable types
and the abstract structures for the three big abstract FS objects
(FS objects, transactions, and roots).

author: ghudson
msg: * tests/libsvn_delta/vdelta-test.c (main): Adjust for simplified
delta combiner interface.

author: ghudson
msg: On fs-abstraction branch, rename libsvn_fs to libsvn_fs_baseline.
* libsvn_fs: Remove (to be replaced with loader library).
* libsvn_fs_baseline: Add, renamed from libsvn_fs.
